sentence.Network_en: Today's decline in stock price canceled out yesterdays gain.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天股票价格下跌,抵消了上一日的收益.

sentence.Network_en: Memories, important yesterdays, were once todays. Treasure and notice today.
sentence.Network_cn: 记忆和重要的昨日也曾今是今天. 珍惜和关注今天吧.

sentence.Network_en: A man he seems of cheerful yesterdays, and confident tomorrows.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天高兴的人对明天也充满信心.

list.abs: 新概念英语（最新版）_百度知道 ... Yesterday morning 昨天早晨 Yesterday afternoon 昨天下午 Yesterday evening 昨天晚上.
历届奥斯卡获奖影片 ... Father of the Bride 岳父大人 Born Yesterday 绛帐海堂春 1950 All the King's Men 当代奸雄提名.
小学到大学英语词汇表(有中文释义) - 豆丁网 ... Tian An Men Square 天安门广场 yesterday morning 昨天早上 all right 一整晚.
初中英语短语大全 ... 24．be over 结束 25．yesterday evening 昨天晚上 27．once a week 每周一次.

entry.def: You use yesterday to refer to the day before today.

example.ex: Yesterday she announced that she is quitting her job.

entry.tran: 过去；（尤指）不久前，近日，日前
entry.def: You can refer to the past, especially the recent past, as yesterday .

example.ex: The worker of today is different from the worker of yesterday.
example.tran: 如今的工人和以往的不同了。
没有过去和未来的世界

auth_sentence.content: Long term, nuclear weapons are really yesterdays technology anyway.
